means: （英国）保守党党员，保守党支持者

word_mean: 保存的，防腐的，保守的：指用非根治性或姑息性手术，维持健康和功能及进行组织结构的修复。参见radical

sentence.Network_en: He said they should turn their fire on the Conservative Party instead.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说他们应该掉转枪口，向保守党开火。

sentence.Network_en: In recent months many conservative politicians have jumped on the anti-immigrant bandwagon.
sentence.Network_cn: 最近几个月，很多保守政客都搭上了“反移民”这班车。

sentence.Network_en: The opposition Conservative Party put a different interpretation on the figures.
sentence.Network_cn: 反对党保守党对这些数字提出一番不同的解释。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... consensus ? n. 一致,团结 conservative ? adj. 保守的 n.保守的人 conserve ? vt. 保存,保全.
* 保守(conservative) GC：没有分别严格管理指标器和数字值之存储器回收管理。此方法是如果它可以成为指标，那就以指标来看待它…
保字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 保守〖 conservative〗 保守派〖 conservative〗 保税〖 protectivetariff;protectivetrade〗.
C ... conservation 维护 conservative 保守的，守旧的 consignment 交付，委托，寄售.

list.abs: 大学英语精读单词表(第二册) - 豆丁网 ... conservation n. 保护；保存 conserve vt. 保存，保藏 superior a. 较好的；优的.
conservatively 保守地conservator 保存器; 储存器-
雅思词汇表_百度文库 ... confess 坦白 conservation 保存 consolation 安慰.
托福词汇表_百度文库 ... insect 昆虫 conservation 保护 architect 建筑师.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'aiming to preserve'): from late Latin conservativus, from conservat- 'conserved', from the verb conservare (see conserve). Current senses date from the mid 19th century onwards

entry.tran: (英国)保守党的，支持保守党的
entry.def: A Conservative politician or voter is a member of or votes for the Conservative Party in Britain.

example.ex: Most Conservative MPs appear happy with the government's reassurances.
example.tran: 大多数保守党下议院议员似乎都对政府的再三保证感到满意。
不再抱任何幻想的保守党选民

entry.def: Someone who is conservative has right-wing views.

example.ex: ...counties whose citizens invariably support the most conservative candidate in any election.
example.tran: 其民众在任何选举中均铁定支持观点最右倾的候选人的几个郡

entry.def: Someone who is conservative or has conservative ideas is unwilling to accept changes and new ideas.

example.ex: People tend to be more aggressive when they're young and more conservative as they get older...
example.tran: 人们年轻的时候往往较为激进，而随着年龄的增长会变得保守起来。

example.ex: It is essentially a narrow and conservative approach to child care.
example.tran: 这实质上是一种狭隘的、因循守旧的照顾孩子的方法。

entry.def: If someone dresses in a conservative way, their clothes are conventional in style.

example.ex: The girl was well dressed, as usual, though in a more conservative style.
example.tran: 这个女孩穿得一如往日那样讲究，只是风格比平日更为传统。

entry.def: A conservative estimate or guess is one in which you are cautious and estimate or guess a low amount which is probably less that the real amount.

example.ex: A conservative estimate of the bill, so far, is about £22,000...
example.tran: 到目前为止，这笔账单保守估计为大约2.2万英镑。

example.ex: This guess is probably on the conservative side.
example.tran: 这个猜测可能偏于保守。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who has conservative ideas or opinions

sentences.sentence: "a colorful character in the buttoned-down, dull-gray world of business"- Newsweek

means.word_mean: 5. conforming to the standards and conventions of the middle class;

auth_sentence.content: Most of the article is Romney and conservative bashing.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most of the article is Romney and conservative bashing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most of the article is Romney and conservative bashing.

auth_sentence.content: Wow, therefore, I must be a conservative.
auth_sentence.res_content: Wow, therefore, I must be a conservative.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Wow, therefore, I must be a conservative.

auth_sentence.content: But - I was a strong conservative for decades.
auth_sentence.res_content: But - I was a strong conservative for decades.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But - I was a strong conservative for decades.

stems_affixes.word_buile: reserve[n.储备[物],储备金;缄默 v.保留,储备;预定]+ed……的→保留的,不多说的
service[n.服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门 v.维修]+able能……的→可服务的→有用的
serv服务+ile……的→为[主人]服务的
deserve[v.应受,值得]+dly→adv.应得报酬地,当然地
con全部+serv保持+e→全部保持下来→保存

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保存,保护,保守;守恒,不灭
stems_affixes.word_buile: conserve保存,保藏+ation表名词→n.保存,保护,保守;守恒,不灭
conserve保存,保藏+ative物→n.保守主义者
servile[adj.奴性的,百依百顺的]+ity表名词→n.奴态,卑屈
de去掉+sert=serv服务,上菜→把正餐撤走,上餐后甜点
ob加强+serve=serv保持+ance表名词→一直在保持→遵守,奉行
observe观察,观测,注意到+ation表名词→n.观察,观测,监视;[n.]观察资料;观察力
observe观察+atory场所→用来观察的场所
re再+serv保留+e→再保留
reserve保留,储备+oir→保留水的地方
serv服务+ant人→服务[主人]的人→仆人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门
stems_affixes.word_buile: serv服务+ice→n.服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门 v.维修

stems_affixes.value_cn: 奴隶状态,惩役,地役权,使用权
stems_affixes.word_buile: serv服务+itude状态→服务的状态→奴隶状态,惩役
con全部+serv保持+e→全部保持下来→保存
de加强+serv服务+e→加强服务→值得[重视]
dis不,坏+serv服务+e→坏的服务→危害

stems_affixes.value_cn: 观察,观测,注意到,监视,遵守,评述,说
stems_affixes.word_buile: ob加强动作+serv保持+e→一直保持→遵守,引申为观察
pre预先+serv保留+e→预先保留→保存
re再+serv保留+e→再保留
serv服务+ice→n.服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门 v.维修

Sentence.sentence: Most of them were rather conservative.

sentences.en: Aunt Mary's a real conservative.She's totally opposed to women going out to work.
sentences.cn: 玛丽姑妈是一个极守旧的人, 她根本就反对女人外出工作。

sentences.en: The professor's a radical in politics but a conservative dresser.
sentences.cn: 教授在政治上是激进派, 但衣着却很守旧。

sentences.en: The young man is very conservative.
get rid of rightist conservative ideas

jushi.english: This year the Conservative Party are in.
After the accident, he became a much more conservative driver.
jushi.chinese: 那次事故后,他开车时变得更加谨慎了。

jushi.english: They soon recognized the nature of the conservative challenge.
jushi.chinese: 他们很快就意识到保守党挑战的性质。
